price: (Yεbεka akyerε Soro abͻfoͻ no sε): “Momoaboa wͻn a wͻyεε bͻne no ne wͻn ahokafoɔ (a wɔwɔ abonsamfoɔ no mu) ne deε wͻsomeε--
arabic: ۞ ٱحۡشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزۡوَٰجَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: uḥ'shurū alladhīna ẓalamū wa-azwājahum wamā kānū yaʿbudūna
